main event: An unidentified object was observed in Vincennes, Indiana on March 26, 1961.
interesting points: The object appeared oval and bright metallic in color,It emitted flashes of light,The sighting lasted for 10 minutes,The object was confirmed by both visual and ground radar observations,It departed at a high rate of speed and disappeared from view.
witness description: the witness stated it could not have been an aircraft, helicopter, or any known aerial device
